name: God's Notebook
description:
What is God's Notebook?

It's a simple environment creator. It uses neural network to detect what you are drawing. Your goal is to create an environment with a given weather condition on the reference image.

I moddeled all the 3D assets but trees and flowers (was running out of time). The code is almoust completely created within the jam period, I had written the neural network library before, but I trained the model and created the doodle recognition within the jam period.

Credits: Drawings:

Pencil drawings are generated with DALL-E (It is now legal to use DALL-E images for commercial purposes).
